functions.tag: {CustomModelData:1,skill:{trigger:'carrot_stick',id:3s,sid:"dash_gem",Slot:"weapon",anchor:1b},display:{Name:'{"text": "冲刺宝石","color": "gold","italic": false}',Lore:['{"text": "传说","color": "gold"}','""','{"text": "21号程序员有一天想到，如果Ta能够","color": "#ffbdd5","italic": false}','{"text": "世界各地横冲直撞该多好。这份","color": "#ffbdd5","italic": false}','{"text": "梦想渗入了梦界，并最终凝结成这颗宝石。","color": "#ffbdd5","italic": false}','"据说，它包含着概念的力量"','""','{"text": "技能：不知后退","color": "red","bold": true,"italic": false}','[{"keybind":"key.use","color": "white","bold": true,"italic": false},"触发，需要充能"]','{"text": "将本宝石持在主或副手上会自动充能。","color": "yellow","italic": false}','{"text": "充能满时施放技能可以向前冲锋1秒。","color": "yellow","italic": false}','{"text": "期间获得抗性提升II效果，且无法被击退。","color": "yellow","italic": false}','{"text": "冲锋路径上的敌人都将受到伤害。","color": "yellow","italic": false}','{"text": "限制：只有疾跑时才能释放技能","color": "red","italic": false,"bold": true}','{"text": "充能时间：10s","color": "green"}']},Damage:20,Unbreakable:0b,HideFlags:127,Enchantments:[{id:'unbreaking',lvl:255}]}
